description.original: An Obsidian Notes plugin for generating and copying block IDs and for copying lines with links to the copied line.
description.translation: 生成/复制块 ID，以及复制带源行的文本行。

dict.name: \"Copy selection with each line li: name: "复制选中内容（每行添加源链接｜默认文本）"
dict.name: \"Copy selection with first line l: name: "复制选中内容（首行添加源链接｜默认文本）"
dict.name: \"Copy embed link to line (default: name: "复制行嵌入链接（默认文本）"
dict.name: \"Copy selection with each line li: name: "复制选中内容（每行添加源链接｜使用选中文本）"

dict.name: \"Copy embed link to line (link te: name: "复制行嵌入链接（使用选中文本）"
dict.name: \"Copy selection with each line li: name: "复制选中内容（每行添加源链接｜使用剪贴板文本）"

dict..setDesc('The default text that \"{{LINK: .setDesc('下方设置中 {{LINK}} 的默认替换文本，留空则显示实际链接文本')
dict..setDesc(\"The full text of copied refer: .setDesc("引用模板格式，使用 {{LINK}} 插入链接")
dict..setDesc(\"Find the first match of a Reg: .setDesc("在每行使用正则表达式进行首次匹配")
dict..setDesc(\"Replace the first match in ea: .setDesc("替换每行的首次匹配内容，使用 {{LINK}} 插入链接")
dict..setDesc(\"When copying a line without h: .setDesc("复制整行时自动删除行首空白")
